column1: .@realdonaldtrump has demonstrated he is a fighter and has always risen to meet any challenge. He and @VP @Mike_Pence will defeat the China virus and bring our economy back to where it was prior to COVID-19. #VPDebate
Thank you @VP @Mike_Pence for leading the @WhiteHouse Coronavirus Task Force. You have demonstrated incredible leadership in this role and delivered a bold response to fight COVID-19. #VPDebate
